entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2 except 6 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2 except 6 inland. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
